thig3.1:1.2: since I gave up the worldly life,
thig3.1:1.4: having gained any peace of mind.
thig3.1:2.1: I had not attained peace of mind,
thig3.1:2.2: and had no power over the mind.
thig3.1:2.3: Then, recollecting the teaching of the Victorious One,
thig3.1:2.4: I was met with a sense of urgency.
thig3.1:3.3: Obtained is the destruction of craving,
thig3.1:3.4: done is the teaching of the Buddha.
thig3.1:3.6: from when craving was made to wither."
